review: Netflix through my receiver is crystal clear, quality is on par or better than bluray - 1080p sharp, Dolby Digital II plus sound.I tried to play two racing games - super choppy and unplayable, maybe the CPU is too weak. On comparison games on the Fire TV /not the stick/ are with PS3 performance.Wi-Fi is stable, it takes around 20 seconds to start the device upon power up, there are numerous software apps and channels for media consumption. Interface is not bad, but not great either - quite puzzling, with HEAVY emphasize on Amazon media purchases...It is an OK device in general, I would not buy it again though, in my opinion is worthless unless you want Amazon video and quality Netflix streaming.
